des: "This is a perfect drink for summer or anytime of year as it makes a wonderful presentation because of its color. Make a big batch of them for all your friends. It's quite easy to make, too!"
ins: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice; pour vodka, rum, and blue Curacao over the ice and stir. Pour lemon-lime soda into the shaker; stir gently. Strain beverage into a cocktail glass and garnish with lemon wedge.
